description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Red Hot Poker, you use the cards that are given to create poker hands within the grid.  Your score is based on the poker hands that you create.  So, better poker hands give a bigger score.  You can create a hand both vertically or horizontally and the cards don't have to be in order to create a hand.
description.short: In Red Hot Poker, you use the cards that are given to create poker hands within the grid.  Your score is based on the poker hands that you create.  So, better poker hands give a bigger score.  You can create a hand both vertically or horizontally and the cards don't have to be in order to create a hand.
